name: The Dress Rehearsal
description:
🎭 IT’S SHOWTIME!  🎭

Will everything go as planned?

A Ludum Dare 49 JAM-entry

Theme: Unstable

Solo project created in 72 hours

All assets were created during the Jam

No 3rd party content was used

****

Controls:

Arrow keys / WASD - Move

ENTER / SPACE / Z - Action

ESC - Quit

****

Gamepad, mouse and touch-controls also available.

Plug in your joystick or try it on your phone!
